text: We change the order of summation: $$\sum_{k=2}^{\infty} \sum_{j=2}^{2008} \frac{1}{j^{k}}=\sum_{j=2}^{2008} \sum_{k=2}^{\infty} \frac{1}{j^{k}}=\sum_{j=2}^{2008} \frac{1}{j^{2}\left(1-\frac{1}{j}\right)}=\sum_{j=2}^{2008} \frac{1}{j(j-1)}=\sum_{j=2}^{2008}\left(\frac{1}{j-1}-\frac{1}{j}\right)=1-\frac{1}{2008}=\frac{2007}{2008}$$
